title: How to Make a Poinsettia Salad

steps.headline: Mix the cream cheese with cream and salt.
Form the mixture into small round balls using your fingers.
Place the pineapple slices on lettuce lined plates.
Put a cheese ball in the center of each pineapple slice.
Cut the maraschino cherries in half.
Cut each cherry half into petal-like strips.
Garnish the cheese balls with the maraschino cherry "petals".
Put a bowl of salad dressing onto the table.
Allow each diner to add as much salad dressing as desired to their salads.

text: Mix the cream cheese with cream and salt.  Form the mixture into small round balls using your fingers.  Place the pineapple slices on lettuce lined plates.  Put a cheese ball in the center of each pineapple slice.  Cut the maraschino cherries in half.  Cut each cherry half into petal-like strips.  Garnish the cheese balls with the maraschino cherry "petals".  Put a bowl of salad dressing onto the table.  Allow each diner to add as much salad dressing as desired to their salads.  Finished.
